title: You Can't Keep Scotland If It Wants To Go (with Kirsten Oswald MP)
itunes:title: You Can't Keep Scotland If It Wants To Go (with Kirsten Oswald MP)
description:
As local lockdowns are lifted in northern England, new ones are imposed in Scotland.

Kirsten Oswald, the SNP's deputy Westminster leader, talks to Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek about the situation north of the border, and a renewed push for independence.

Plus, is the government's back-to-work push a dud? Bloomberg Opinion columnist Therese Raphael joins to discuss.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
